description: Test prompts for Slides/Presentation generation at different complexity levels

simple: Create a basic presentation outline with key points
Generate simple slides covering the main topics
Make a straightforward slide deck with essential information
standard: Generate a comprehensive presentation with well-structured slides, talking points, and visual suggestions
Create a balanced slide deck with multiple sections, clear messaging, and supporting details
Develop a professional presentation with organized content and speaker notes
detailed: Generate an extensive presentation with detailed slides, comprehensive speaker notes, visual design recommendations, and transition suggestions
Create an in-depth slide deck with multiple narrative threads, rich content, and detailed delivery guidance
Produce a sophisticated presentation with layered information, supporting data, and professional design specifications
comprehensive: Generate an exhaustive presentation with complete topic coverage, detailed speaker notes, visual design specifications, timing recommendations, and audience engagement strategies
Create a full-featured slide deck with comprehensive narrative, extensive supporting materials, professional design guidelines, and delivery best practices
Develop a premium presentation with publication-ready slides, complete presenter guide, audience handouts, and strategic communication framework
